name: Bahiana
description: Bahiana has a rustic, fresh and casual look. Its ideal for composing condensed titles and short texts. The family has OpenType alternatives to make the texture more organic. There are 490 glyphs and diacritics, supporting over 103 Latin languages (including Guarani.) Designed by Daniela Raskovsky and Pablo Cosgaya.
author: Omnibus-Type
